title: SVGator
description:
SVGator is an online SVG animation software that lets users create animations without any coding skills. Besides the SVG vector format, there are other export formats available as well: GIF,  .JS, .DART, multiple raster image and video formats.
SVGator also supports custom easing functions, snapping, and interactivity, so the animation can be set to start on mouse-over, on scroll into view, or on click. It includes advanced animators like Morph, Filter, Color, Translate, Stroke, and many more.
